caption: the protagonist and his friend are seen chatting, during which the protagonist mentioned the memory technique called "Mind Palace" and explained its principle. Subsequently, the protagonist received a phone call with a password from the CIA laboratory he had infiltrated. Key points include: Mind Palace is a memory technique that can help people remember things; the principle of Mind Palace involves creating a mental blueprint in the mind and placing memories in specific locations; this location can be anything, like a house or a street; the protagonist received a phone call containing a password from the CIA laboratory he had stolen from; the password was "HOUND", from Project Hound; the protagonist was concerned that he might not be able to access the laboratory; his friend mentioned the Sony company, but the protagonist did not hear clearly; the protagonist’s friend also mentioned a name, which will be referred to as “a person”.
